snippet.title: Apotheker - Coming 11/20 - Wishlist now on Steam!
snippet.description:
Apotheker is a unique story-based logic puzzle game coming to Steam on November 20th! Meet a cast of colorful clientele and brew the perfect potions using a variety of ingredients and tools, each sending your brew closer to the boiling point. Hone your skills and pick your specialty - will you be a worshipped healer, or a deadly poisoner? Unravel the mysteries of the city and discover all of the intricacies the magic of science has to offer!

Wishlist the game here: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1429950/
Follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/PineDrake
